column3: marriage tends to constrict oneself over time. My Poochie needs a dangerous upgrade to... rectify this situation.

Text: I can always trust you to terrify.
What an exceptional display of mediocrity.
I’d watch your back in the future.

column3: but she could always be cuter!

Text: This upgrade is like mewsic to my ears! Kyaaaa~!

column3: at least she’ll always have her purrrsonality.

Text: We want to take our familiar on a rockin’ roadtrip to Creepytown.
You’re nailing it like a demon!
